Royal Beast - Defense +1, Claws (A3, AP(2)), Fast, Impact(3), Tough(+3)
Royal Chariot - Defense +2, Hooves (A2), Fast, Impact(6), Tough(+6)

gains.label: Giant Great Bow (48, A1, AP(2), Deadly(3))
gains.name: Giant Great Bow

specialRules.hint: This units shooting attacks always ignore cover Kings Will: If the hero is part of a unit of Mummies, Skeletons, Skeleton Guard or Skeleton Knights, then that unit counts as having Quality 3+.
specialRules.name: Cursed Arrows
specialRules.label: Cursed Arrows
specialRules.description: This units shooting attacks always ignore cover Kings Will: If the hero is part of a unit of Mummies, Skeletons, Skeleton Guard or Skeleton Knights, then that unit counts as having Quality 3+.

specialRules.hint: Whenever this unit takes a morale test it is passed automatically. Then roll as many dice as remaining models/tough in the unit, and for each result of 1-2 the unit takes one wound, which cant be regenerated.
specialRules.name: Undead
specialRules.label: Undead
specialRules.description: Whenever this unit takes a morale test it is passed automatically. Then roll as many dice as remaining models/tough in the unit, and for each result of 1-2 the unit takes one wound, which cant be regenerated.

specialRules.hint: This model counts as having the Fear special rule, and gets +4 to its Fear rolls.
specialRules.name: Terrifying
specialRules.label: Terrifying
specialRules.description: This model counts as having the Fear special rule, and gets +4 to its Fear rolls.

spells.name: Blade Curse
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12 gets +1 to melee rolls next time it fights.

spells.name: Storm of Skulls
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12 takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Protection
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12 gets Regeneration next time its wounded.

spells.name: Desiccation
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12 takes 1 hit with AP(4) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Smiting
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12 may immediately charge by up to 6 and gets +1 to hit for that melee.

spells.name: Vengeance
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12 must take a morale test. If failed it takes 1 automatic hit per model.
